treatment-md.title: Fragilonola fragilis László, Ronkay & Ronkay, 2015, sp. n.
treatment-md.article-title: Contribution to the knowledge on the Palaearctic and Oriental taxa of the Meganola s. l. (Lepidoptera, Noctuoidea, Nolidae, Nolinae) generic complex with descriptions of 4 new genera and 11 new species
